high_descs: walk to face cabinet below left sink
put candle on top of toilet tank
anns.task_desc: put candle on top of toilet tank

high_descs: Turn left and step forward, then turn left to face the leftmost sink.
Open the leftmost cabinet beneath the sink and take out the candle.
Turn left to face the toilet.
Put the candle on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a candle on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the vanity with the sinks.
Open the lower left cabinet, pick up the green candle from inside and close the door.
Turn left to face the white toilet.
Put the green candle on the middle of the toilet tank.
anns.task_desc: Place a green candle on a toilet tank.
